titleInfo.title: Arab groups : Moslem Arabs protest burning of Al Aksah mosque
titleInfo.subTitle: [Arab groups : Moslem Arabs protest burning of al-Aqsa mosque]

mods.abstract: Image of demonstrators, some carrying placards that read: "FATAH Palestine"; "Atheist Israel uses Judaism and mocks other religions"; "Moslems demand better protection for their holy places in occupied Palestine" and "Zionists = persecutors of Arab women and girls". They are marching in a line around a bend in the sidewalk, led by two women carrying the Palestinian flag and two boys wearing keffiyehs, one of whom holds a smaller flag ; University Avenue in background

Image of demonstrators, some carrying placards, marching in a line around a bend in the sidewalk, led by two women carrying the Palestinian flag and two boys wearing keffiyehs, one of whom holds a smaller flag ; University Avenue in background
mods.note: One neg (19-19A) scanned out of 13 in assignment | Box 2 CD 3

hierarchicalGeographic.citySection: University Avenue - City Hall to Queen's Park Legislature
